Wondrous Item (Gloves), (requires attunement)

These otherwise unremarkable-looking gloves manifest a spectral sixth finger to aid you in your handiwork.

While Attuned

While you are wearing them, you can add an additional 1d6 to the results of any Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) or Intelligence (Craft) checks.

If you are a @Compendium[undertaking.archetypes-rogue.ZYETWQRILPMN3521]{Thief Rogue}, the gloves also grant you one additional “Finger” to your maximum.
